Did you know that in cold weather viruses spread more easily? It happens because the outer envelope of viral cells hardens in colder weather. Just like a winter coat, this outer layer protects the virus, allowing it to readily spread. Which is why it's crucial to [support the immune system](https://www.betternutrition.com/immunity-tips/balanced-immune-health/) during the cold weather months. And just how do you do that? It comes down to the basics of eating right, hydrating, exercising, lowering stress, and of course, washing your hands.
